abstract: Bill Cosby, whose lawyers have denied the accusations of many women that he spiked their drinks and sexually assaulted them, jokes about the subject at a performance in Canada.
snippet: Bill Cosby, whose lawyers have denied the accusations of many women that he spiked their drinks and sexually assaulted them, jokes about the subject at a performance in Canada.

headline.main: Cosby Makes a Joke About Drinking Around Him
headline.print_headline: Cosby Makes a Joke Referring to Accusations
